content.context: This category creates an overview of the type of engagement expected by the relevant content type, as well as how relevant the information is within each field group belonging to it. This definition establishes the type of example field this part of the content type is positioned at. This is the title of the content type or field group, created based off of a Drupal site structure. Contains a general description of the content type or field group listed.

types.type: Informative Main Create Agreement Use agreements to form mutual benefits for completing work which may otherwise not get accomplished.
Required Sub Job Describe the job that is needed, in as much detail as you can.
Optional Sub Provisions Describe any mutual benefits to this agreement that come with the job implementation process as commitment happens.
Optional Sub Considerations Add things to consider regarding this agreement, that the job may entail from time to time, which may get overlooked but are important to keep in mind.
Informative Main Create Article Use articles for time-sensitive content like news, press releases or blog posts.
Recommended Sub Avatar Set an avatar or theme for your post.
Required Sub Entry What is your article about?
Multimedia Main Create Audio Use audio files to hear amazing sounds.
Required Sub Add, Browse or Import Audio Create a playlist of audio files.
Recommended Sub Contents Describe the content of what people will hear in these audio files.
Informative Main Create Basic Page Use basic pages for your static content, such as an 'About us' page.
Informative Main Create Biography Use biographies to introduce yourself to the community.
Required Sub Introduction Discuss your personal biography in detail.
Optional Sub Impressions Describe your community impressions, in ways that your feedback can be used at any time to implement improvements. We are here to help you out, if you need it.
Guidance Main Create Category Use categories to list content into links of relativity.
Engagement Main Create Concern Use concerns to voice care for projects of passion, that volunteer contributors like yourself appreciate.
Required Sub Concern Describe your passion in regards to an actively ongoing project accepting volunteer contributions, including your own.
Recommended Sub Issues Describe the work you have done to further the goal of this volunteer project, that you are concerned for.
Required Sub Care Describe the type of care that is regularly needed or sought for, in order to stabilize and grow this project of passion further.
Recommended Sub Contribute Add details for any position open to new volunteers, concerning any assistance that is needed with this project.
Optional Sub Project Add recruitment information to help this project gain new volunteer contributors.

Engagement Main Create Debate Use debates to have civil arguments with people about opposing views, while finding things in common that can make improvements to ideas, so that change can be implemented for the better.
Required Sub Argument Describe an attachment to purpose that you feel passionate about, enough to have a civil argument on, while keeping an open mind for opposition.
Required Sub Debate Describe what you are, and are not willing to address as talking points for this civil argument.
Optional Sub Aftermath Describe how this debate is going, by periodically updating your point of view, as it, you and others exchange perspectives around this civil argument.
Engagement Main Create Discussion Use discussions to gather initial feedback, on ideas generated by community interest.
Required Sub Discuss Describe in detail any idea that comes to mind, in relation to this topic of conversation.

Recommended Sub Experience Describe feedback, knowledge or insight that you intend to discover, while sharing your own thoughts and experiences relevant to this topic of conversation with other people.
Multimedia Main Create Document Use documents to read amazing things.
Required Sub Add, Upload Or Import Documents Create a folder of document files.
Recommended Sub Overview Describe what people will read when opening these documents.
Multimedia Main Create Embed Use file embeds to remotely display media from other sources across the web.

Required Sub Add Embed Code Or A Source URL To One Or More Files Create a playlist of remote media files. Please note that we have no control over when and or if media embeds will no longer remain online.
Recommended Sub Featuring Describe what people will be able to enjoy when viewing these file embeds. We will do our best to cache media in the event the embed source fails to load.
Participation Main Create Event Use events to organize, plan and orchestrate real moments of timeless continuity.
Required Sub Event Add relevant information about this event.
Required Sub Live Select the date and time, when this event begins and ends.
Required Sub Plan Describe what will happen during the event, as a schedule of things to do.
Required Sub Attendance Provide location, connection and contact information for any interested people that want to attend this event.
Required Sub Requirements Add any necessary expectations of commitment that might be needed or asked for, by all attendees of this event.

Recommended Sub Obligations Add some things to do, like enticing incentives or extra special contributions that attendees can look forward to while they are gathered together, in order to further the cause, purpose and reason for going to this event.
Recommended Sub Vision Describe your experience at an event like this, to others who may not know what to expect.
Recommended Sub Role Describe what role you play at this event, and the other roles available for different attendees to fulfill if applicable.
Recommended Sub Outlook For the uninitiated, describe what kind of impact an event like this has on the wider community, and how important it is to those who participate.
Multimedia Main Create File Use file attachments to display archives of importance that can be saved to your device.
Required Sub Add, Upload Or Import Files Create a folder of files.
Recommended Sub Contents Describe what these attached files contain.
Engagement Main Create Game Use games to interactively engage community contributors with creative trivia.
Required Sub Rules Describe the game in detail, and include any rules players have to follow to score a win.
Recommended Sub Scores Periodically update the score as the game gets popular, attracting more players.
Participation Main Create Gift Use gifts to give something to or provide a complementary service for helping out someone or a specific cause in need.
Required Sub Gift Explain what you are gifting in as much detail as you can.
Required Sub Reclamation Describe who this gift is for, in the context of it going towards a person, cause or applicable donation.
Recommended Sub Explanation Explain why are you gifting this item to this recipient?
Recommended Sub Recipient Describe how this person or cause can claim this gift for themselves.
Informative Main Create Goal Use goals to implement change, in order to set yourself and or others up for success later on.
Required Sub Goal Describe the change you will commit to, and the focus you need to plan for, in order to help you achieve the success you want to make happen.
Recommended Sub Progress Add your progress you have made along the way, until your goal is fully implemented.

Recommended Sub Challenges Describe the challenges you are facing, and your plan to overcome each one. It is okay to collect feedback, and ask for help if you need to. No goal is met by one person alone.
Participation Main Create Group Use groups to share lists of content that relate to a particular topic of interest for greater analysis.
Required Sub Info Describe the content and purpose of this group.
Required Sub People Add links to the profiles of people in our community including yourself, who have contributed content relating to the purpose of this group.
Required Sub Posts Add links to other posts or create your own in our community, that relates to the purpose of this group.
Required Sub Replies Add links to replies made on posts in our community, including your own, that relate to the purpose of this group.
Recommended Sub Media Post directly or add links to media in our community, including your own, that relates to the purpose of this group.
Recommended Sub Files Attach directly or add links to files in our community, that relates to the purpose of this group.
Recommended Sub Topics Add links to other content categories in our community, that relate to the purpose of this group.
Optional Sub Links Add links to content stored anywhere on the web, including in our community, that relate to the purpose of this group.
Informative Main Create Guide Use guides to create course materials.
Required Sub Section Add as many sections to your guide as is required, for the material to be presented properly.
Informative Main Create Idea Use ideas to organize your thoughts into plans of action, intent and focus.
Required Sub Idea Describe the idea you have come up with, as it relates to something obtainable through your own efforts, research or commitment to purpose.
Required Sub Evolution To the best of your ability, provide in detail the steps you believe to be required, in order to shape this idea into reality as you see it unfolding.
Recommended Sub Accommodation Describe the difficulty in getting this idea to market, if you were to do so alone.
Recommended Sub Value If your idea has been implemented, add the most appropriate (preferably numeric based) values that best represents its purpose in action.
Recommended Sub Purpose As need grows into demand, describe the meaning of the values provided above, whereby this idea holds true to purpose the most, throughout its implementation if applicable.
Engagement Main Create Interest Use interests to assign lifestyle and culture, to hobbies and projects which appeal to you.
Required Sub Interest Describe a missing part of your life that you want to reclaim, through people, places and things.
Required Sub Seeking Describe the most relevant aspects of your interest that can best help you discover a match to what you are searching for, in correlation with a person, place or thing.
Recommended Sub Attraction Describe what attracts you to this interest in the context of a person, place or thing, including ideas that you are aware of.
Recommended Sub Detraction Describe what detracts you from this interest in the context of a person, place or thing, including ideas that you are aware of.
Recommended Sub Progression How much are you involved in doing something about obtaining your desires as they relate to this interest, in the context of a person, place or thing.
Informative Main Create Journal Use journals to document your life experience.
Required Sub Entries You can add as many entries as you like to your journal.
Experience Main Create Memory Use memories to display stories of great importance, revealing the events contained within.
Required Sub Memory Describe the story that unfolded, which made this memory so special to you.
Recommended Sub Reference Add the date, time and place, where this memory came into being.
Recommended Sub Replication Say if there is anything you would, could or should have changed to recreate a different result, than the one that already happened.
Experience Main Create Mood Use moods to share how you feel, alongside the cause for your emotion.
Required Sub Mood Add your emotions based around people, places, things or ideas, and share why you feel that way for each one.
Informative Main Create Note Use notes to create a task list of things in motion.
Required Sub Note Add a note, task list, reminder, or emotion, as a contemporary state of focus to address sometime soon.
Informative Main Create Opinion Use opinions to assign a topic of conversation, founded upon a belief you hold.
Required Sub Opinion Describe your belief in detail about anything, that comes to mind.
Multimedia Main Create Photo Use photographic files to see amazing things.
Required Sub Add Links To, Embed, Upload Or Import Photos Create a playlist of photographic files.
Recommended Sub Contents Describe what people will see in these photographic files.
Informative Main Create Pledge Use pledges to organize support, funding or guidance towards a cause in need.
Required Sub Pledge Describe the cause you are asking support, funding or guidance for.
Required Sub Instructions Add details for pledge contributions to this cause, such as monetary information or other relevant obligations depending on the type of support being offered.
Required Sub Recipients Describe who this pledge is for, and how supporting it in any way will help achieve something, that could not be possible without contributions to this cause.
Recommended Sub Updates Describe what has happened since this pledge was created, enticing people to make informed decisions accordingly.
Informative Main Create Projection Use projections to go above and beyond the information at hand, in ways vision itself finds newsworthy.
Required Sub Projection Describe your theoretical knowledge, based on data that is being developed, alongside ideas of progress that you are aware of, in regards to your forecast.
Required Sub Forecast Describe the projection in detail, that you are wanting to make, in regards to an event of any kind.
Recommended Sub Prediction Describe how your forecast will be most likely implemented, according to this theoretical projection.
Recommended Sub Review Describe how events have unfolded, relating to the intent, design or activity of this projected forecast.
Engagement Main Create Question Use questions to obtain knowledge, that cannot be found anywhere else.
Required Sub Question What do you want to know more about? Ask the community anything...
Informative Main Create Quote Use quotes for messages of motivation.
Required Sub Topic What type of content does this quote reference?
Required Sub Quote Add your quote here.
Required Sub Author The author of the quote.
Informative Main Create Recipe Use recipes to create repeatable replications of any kind.
Required Sub Formula Describe your recipe in as much detail as you can, in the context of an idea, change or event brought to life.
Required Sub Steps Explain all of the steps involved to put things in motion for this recipe.
Recommended Sub Counter Steps Explain what to substitute if anything, that this recipe is compatible with, in order to get the same or a similar result.
Optional Sub Help Provide extra support options as needed to other community contributors for this recipe.
Participation Main Create Request Use requests to ask for something already in existence to be shared with you.
Required Sub Request Describe what you need in as much detail as you can, in the context of something attainable or obtainable that other community contributors can provide you with.
Recommended Sub Preference Explain how best this request if implemented will be able to impact or reach you.
Recommended Sub Connect Provide necessary ways of achieving the best result that you would prefer to engage with someone through working out a plan to resolve this request.
Experience Main Create Review Use reviews to let others know about something important which you have experienced that others may get to explore themselves in the near future.
Required Sub Review Describe what you are reviewing and why you feel this way about it, in the context of a person, place or thing.
Recommended Sub Improvements Provide suggestions or feedback based on further changes that could be made to make the experience better for someone else, in the context of this review.
Engagement Main Create Story Use stories to create memorable books of both fictional and real content.
Required Sub Chapters Add as many chapters to this story as you like, and interactively engage viewers upon a journey like no other.
Multimedia Main Create Video Use video files to watch amazing things.
Required Sub Add Links To, Embed, Upload Or Import Videos Create a playlist of video files.
Recommended Sub Contents Describe what content people will watch when viewing these video files.
Engagement Main Create Wish Use wishes to reveal your dreams to the world.
Required Sub Desires This is what I dream of, and why.
Recommended Sub Hopes This is how I would make the most use out of my wish, if it came true.
Recommended Sub Benefits This is how other people would benefit who support me by having this wish be implemented, that I know of, in the context of passing forward my appreciation.
Recommended Sub Prayers Add a prayer to your wish.
Optional Sub Requests Describe in detail your willingness to accept an invitation for contributing to such a desire, if you were offered the opportunity to manifest it in part with someone else.
